cluster.description: Cluster name. Can be used alone (uses default resource pool) or with resource_pool (to specify a pool within the cluster)

resource_pool.description: Resource pool path. Can be a full path, or a relative path within a cluster if cluster is also specified

template.description: VM template name to clone from

template_folder.description: Folder path where template is located (e.g., '/Templates' or 'Templates/Talos')

vm_folder.description: Folder path where VMs should be created (e.g., '/VMs/Production')
